argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_hmopf | |- ( T e. HrmOp -> T : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 2 |  | #P_hmopf | |- ( U e. HrmOp -> U : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 3 |  | #P_honegsub | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ U : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = ( T -op U ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ U e. HrmOp ) -> ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = ( T -op U ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_neg1rr | |- -u 1 e. RR |
| 6 |  | #P_hmopm | |- ( ( -u 1 e. RR /\ U e. HrmOp ) -> ( -u 1 .op U ) e. HrmOp ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpan | |- ( U e. HrmOp -> ( -u 1 .op U ) e. HrmOp ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hmops | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ ( -u 1 .op U ) e. HrmOp ) -> ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) e. HrmOp ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ U e. HrmOp ) -> ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) e. HrmOp ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ U e. HrmOp ) -> ( T -op U ) e. HrmOp ) |
